data.name: Lovely Trap
data.detailed_description:
Summary

This game is a cute roguelike action game! !
Players need to brave the underground maze to save the beautiful girl~

Specific gameplay: The player controls the character to go underground and get as many points as possible to unlock the CG casual action game.
A variety of beautiful girls with different looks are waiting for players to unlock!

System


Move the left and right keys to avoid obstacles and move down, descend to the most layers as possible, and get the most points!

Score a certain level to unlock beautiful CGs in the gallery!

data.short_description: It's a man (?) to challenge the highest score!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: inter core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
